tv-channel.label: Farmtronics Home Computer
mail.text: Dear @,^^Congratulations!  You have been selected to receive a complementary FARMTRONICS BOT, the latest in farm technology!^With this robotic companion, your days of toiling in the fields will soon be over.^Check your local stores for additional bots as needed.  Enjoy!^^{{botItem}}
bot.name: Farmtronics Bot {{number}}
